articles.title: Miriam Margolyes makes Vogue cover debut at 82 - BBC
articles.description: The iconic actress tells the magazine she "wouldn't want to be straight for anything".
articles.content:
Miriam Margolyes says she "wouldn't want to be straight for anything", as she makes her Vogue cover debut at 82. 
The actress posed for vibrant photos and discussed the joy she felt in her sexuality… [+2063 chars]

articles.author: Heidi Parker
articles.title: Harrison Ford, 80, insists he 'never wanted to be rich and famous' - Daily Mail
articles.description: 'No one ever believes this, but I never wanted to be rich and famous,' he told People this week. 'I just wanted to be an actor.' He keeps making massive films that have made him rich.
articles.content:
Harrison Ford - who is reportedly worth more than $300million - never left carpentry and got into acting for the money.
'No one ever believes this, but I never wanted to be rich and famous,' he told… [+2571 chars]
